text: Laurens van Ravens (18 September 1922 â€“ 23 October 2018), also Lau, was a Dutch international football referee. He was featured at the 1970 FIFA World Cup. He officiated in the 1950s, 60s and 70s, becoming an international referee in 1966. He was born in Schiedam, Netherlands. His final game was Coen Moulijn's farewell match between Feyenoord and Uruguay on 9 June 1972.Schiedamse topscheidsrechter Van Ravens overleden - Rijnmond Van Ravens died on 23 October 2018 in Rijswijk, Netherlands at the age of 96.Lau van Ravens (1922-2018), arbiter die bijna sportman van het jaar werd - Volkskrant ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dutch football referees Category:People from Schiedam Category:Sportspeople from South Holland
title: Laurens van Ravens
